product_overview: Olive Discount Hub is a multi-lingual e-commerce platform focused on selling Olive Young products across Europe and South America, providing premium UI with real-time currency conversion and responsive product display.
core_goals: Enable real-time currency exchange rate updates with reliable fallback.
Support seamless internationalization across 10 locales with synchronized language and currency switching.
Deliver a responsive and aesthetically pleasing product display adaptable to multiple devices.
Ensure robust user experience with graceful error handling and consistent UI behavior.
key_features: Real-time currency conversion using exchange rates fetched and updated every 5 minutes.
Multi-language support using next-intl with 10 different locales and synchronized currency symbols.
Responsive grid layout for product display adapting from mobile (1 column) to desktop (up to 4 columns).
Fallback UI for loading and error states during currency data fetch.
Language and currency switcher integrated in the header updating URL locale and pricing dynamically.
Product card UI implementing text truncation and overflow handling for long product titles and prices.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the platform with default locale and currency derived from URL.
User selects a different language from the header language switcher, triggering locale and currency updates reflecting immediately across the UI.
Currency exchange rates are auto-fetched and refreshed every 5 minutes in the background, updating product prices in real-time.
Product grid layout dynamically adjusts based on screen size ensuring usability on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
On currency fetching failure, a fallback or loading state is displayed to maintain user experience without UI breaks.
Product cards truncate long titles and adapt price display to prevent layout overflow.
validation_criteria: Currency exchange rate fetching occurs every 5 minutes without duplicate polling or memory leaks.
Language switcher URL locale updates correctly and all text content updates instantly with translations.
Currency symbol and price convert appropriately per active locale (all 10 supported languages).
No missing translation keys exist across all locale message files.
Product grid layout matches the expected column count by viewport size (1,2,3/4).
UI gracefully handles long price formats and product titles without breaking layout.
Fallback UI displays during currency loading or on errors without causing crashes or degraded UX.
